item.title: Breaking Down the New Budgets in Forecaster
item.description: I have to admit, certain questions make me uncomfortable. Some of these questions include: Why is it necessary to rebuild the reports.dic file so frequently? Are commissions classified as payables or payroll expenses? What is the process for setting up a new budget year in Forecaster? Question #3 comes up often, and it makes me uncomfortable because there isn’t a straightforward answer. Often (and I’ve been guilty of this too), the term “input set” is mistaken to be synonymous with “budget.
